name: "Christmas with NARIA" poster
description: 11" by 17" colourful poster of "CHRISTMAS WITH NARIA".

name: "Christmas with NARIA" Concert, Dec.7, 2013
description:
Join NARIA and guests for an unforgettable evening of traditional Christmas and popular classical music, sing along carols, sparkling wine, delicious treats and holiday atmosphere. 
Featuring performance of Lanor Choristers conducted by Elitza Yordanov, violinist Oleksandra Fedyshyn and pianist Sunny Kim.

Dec.7, 2013, 6.30 pm at Armour Heights Presbyterian, 105 Wilson 
Ave., Toronto.
Doors open at 6 pm.
Tickets are $25

name: "Christmas with NARIA" Dec. 21, 2013
description:
Join NARIA and guests for an unforgettable evening of traditional Christmas and popular classical music, sing along carols, sparkling wine, delicious treats and holiday atmosphere.
Featuring performances of Lanor Choristers conducted by Elitza Yordanov, violinist Oleksandra Fedyshyn and pianist Sunny Kim.
Dec.21, 2013, 7.30 pm at St.James Catholic Church, 728 Annette St., Toronto.
Door opens at 7 pm.
Tickets are $25

name: "NARIA, Aria of the North" Digital Album
description:
This exclusive selection of NARIA favourite classics is dedicated to the fans, who requested to release these songs after falling in love with them during the live shows.

It features the following 6 pieces:

1. "Brindisi", from La Traviata
2. "Flower Duet", from Lakme
3. "Barcarolle", from The Tales of Hoffmann
4. "Nella Fantasia"
5. "Unbreak My Heart", cover of Toni Braxton and Il Divo
6. "O Mare E Tu", cover of Andrea Bocelli and Dulce Pontes

NOTE: This is NOT a physical CD but downloadable files only. The link for the download will be delivered in 24 hours.

name: CD: NARIA Opera Pop Fantasia
description: Naria Opera Pop Fantasia is the second album produced in the same genre as their first "NARIA Opera Pop Supernova". The latest release features 4 new tracks: "Cry Away", "Canadian Girl", "My Faith", "1+1+1 dance remix" as well as the 4 most popular ones from the debut album. This CD is a must have if classical crossover is your favourite genre. TRACKLIST 1 • My Faith 2 • The Witch 3 • Canadian Girl 4 • Cry Away 5 • Dear Juliet 6 • My Mother Taught Me 7 • 1+1+1 8 • 1+1+1 [dance remix] NARIA is a Canadian classical crossover group comprised of four sopranos: Annaliese Jelilian, Katya Tchoubar, Michelle Danese, and Anna Bateman.

name: CD: NARIA Opera Pop Supernova
description: Introducing...Opera Pop Supernova! The debut album by NARIA — 4 brilliant voices of Katya, Michelle, Anna and Annaliese that come together with vocal prowess, original compositions, classical high notes and individual personal style – guaranteed listening pleasure. TRACKLIST 1 • Addio 2 • 1+1+1 3 • The Witch 4 • Betrayed 5 • The Moon 6 • Dear Juliet 7 • Ambitious 8 • My Mother Taught Me

name: Small Naria logo
description:
This hotfix rhinestone Naria logo can be applied with iron on your favorite t-shirt, hat, hoodie, tote bag, jacket or anything else with a flat surface. Beautifully crafted with Swarovski like stones, dimensions are 5'x3' inches.
Instructions are included.

name: Large Naria logo
description:
This hotfix rhinestone Naria logo can be applied with iron on your favorite t-shirt, hoodie, tote bag, jacket or anything else with a flat surface. Beautifully crafted with Swarovski like stones, dimensions are 11'x7' inches.
Instructions are included.

name: Custom Design Glasses (Wedding)
description:
We are delighted to introduce a new product of our friend and colleague, Asya Bina Akhoundov. These are handmade holiday, wedding or anniversary champagne glasses which are hand crafted with a custom design!
 
You can choose the design from the pictures or you can contact Asya Bina Akhoundov directly to discuss your own ideas. She can do it all. You will not be disappointed!

Original design using pearls, Swarovski crystals and handmade polymer clay with cold porcelain sculptural design. It can be a perfect gift for any special occasion.

All materials used for decoration are water proof. It is a special paint and out-liners for glass that I baked for longer life. Polymer clay flowers after baking to a permanent hardness become very durable, good looking and long-lived.
You can wash it with warm water.

It takes 3 to 5 days to craft the design. However, if you will be ordering glasses from your own design, please contact me to discuss the time line.

These glasses will be carefully packed for shipping. You will be notified when your order is shipped.

Shipping in Canada - less than 7 business days.
Shipping to US - 6-14 business days.
Shipping to other countries - 3-5 weeks.

If you desire quicker delivery, feel free to contact me. It can be easily arranged (however, costing more).

Please contact Asya Bina Akhoundov at 416-817-0157 or
email asyaakhoundov@gmail.com
